word: "AS WE APPROACHED THE SPRING, THE YOUNG MAN SAID NOTHING, BUT LOOKED TOWARD ME AND SMILED WITH AN EXPRESSION OF SATISFACTION, AND WAVED ONE HAND TOWARD THE SPRING, AS MUCH AS TO SAY: 'DON'T YOU THINK THAT IS AN ALL-HEALING SPRING?' QUITE A LARGE COMPANY OF PERSONS, WITH BROTHER AND SISTER WHITE AT THEIR HEAD, CAME UP TO THE SPRING ON THE OPPOSITE SIDE FROM US. THEY ALL LOOKED PLEASANT AND CHEERFUL, YET A HOLY SOLEMNITY SEEMED TO BE ON THEIR COUNTENANCES.
